summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3919 for the improvement of the alley in block 16, Summit Addition Supplemental, being the alley between 17th Avenue North and 18th Avenue North, from East Denny Way to East John Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47695, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
